# [Interview #43: KOD Signing Report - Ted Herman, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=43#2)

#### Question

There were two plot related questions in the Q&A, both were RAFO'd: Did Aviendha's gateway in beginning of
*The Path of Daggers*
go back in time?

#### Robert Jordan

RAFO.
